title: Avengers: Endgame
assumptions: The user's preference for Tony Stark's death (yes) aligns with the movie's plot and is reflected in the high positive fan sentiment for Avengers: Endgame.
The user's preference for Captain America not dying (no) also aligns with the movie's plot (his aging) and contributes to the overall positive fan sentiment.

The overwhelmingly positive fan sentiment (100% positive) suggests that the key plot decisions, including the fates of central characters, were well-received by the audience, leading to slight increases in critical ratings and a reinforced strong box office performance.
